title: Vanilla Tweaks
description: A LifeForge client module for browsing and downloading packs from the VT website

cart.title: Your cart is empty
cart.description: Click on packs to add them

clearConfirm.title: Clear All Packs?
clearConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to remove all packs from your cart? This action cannot be undone.

versionChange.title: Change Version?
versionChange.description: Changing the version will clear your cart. Are you sure you want to continue?
